about_the_game:
With CINEV, anyone can easily create high-quality 3D videos in just a few clicks.

Make your own characters using our Character Creator. Place them in one of our top-quality backgrounds to start your story. Leverage our camera, motion, and light presets to unfold your story on screen like a film director.

The ultimate video production tool to empower all creators out there to breathe life into their story. Try CINEV Studio with your story today!

[How do I make my video?]

Select a background and a cut template to start your CINEV production journey. You can write your lines first, then add characters and camera directions; or add camera and motion first, then write the lines for your characters afterwards.

See how your imagination quickly come to life on screen!

[Key Features]


1. Add Scenes


  • Template Editor: Don’t worry if you are completely new to 3D animation production or video editing tools. Simply select the cuts you want and add them to your storyboard. Then go on to edit the details, change the actors, tweak the motions, add some expressions!


  • Dynamic Environment: Simply drag the sliders to change day into night, or click the weather to change a sunny summer day into a dark, stormy evening. If you want, you can even change the size, position, and color of the Moon in the sky!


2. Add Characters


  • Character Creator: You can change your characters facial features and body shape to fit your story.


3. Add Motion


  • Animation Library: Find the animation you want from our library and apply them to your actors. Create their path and make them move like a game avatar.


  • Motion Maker: Blend multiple animations to create a unique motion you need. You can also upload voice files to auto-generate lip motions for your actors too!

Have fun with all these features, and unravel your stories into quality videos. If you don’t have a full story in mind, why not start by creating your own virtual character, or decorate a house to your taste? Share your work with the community and we’re sure your imagination will start to spread far and wide!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: All versions of Windows 10 build 1909.1350 and newer, and Windows 11 with support for DirectX 12 Agility SDK are supported.
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Video cards must be NVIDIA RTX-2000 series and higher, or AMD RX-6000 series and higher
  • DirectX: Version 12
